abilities.name: Coin Bonus
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw a card. If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, draw 1 more card.

attacks.name: Make It Rain
attacks.text: Discard any number of Basic Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Surf Back
attacks.text: You may shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

abilities.name: Run Away Draw
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards. If you drew any cards in this way, shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

abilities.name: Run Away Draw
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards. If you drew any cards in this way, shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

abilities.name: Adrena-Brain
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached, you may move up to 3 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Flip the Script
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may draw 3 cards. You can't use more than 1 Flip the Script Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Cruel Arrow
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Arven

name: Iono
text: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, each player draws a card for each of their remaining Prize cards.

name: Lana's Aid
text: Put up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box and Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

name: Superior Energy Retrieval
text: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Put up to 4 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't choose a card you discarded with the effect of this card.)

name: Nest Ball
text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Earthen Vessel
text: You can use this card only if you discard another card from your hand.  Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Switch
text: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Counter Catcher
text: You can use this card only if you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent.  Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.

name: Energy Search Pro
text: Search your deck for any number of Basic Energy cards of different types, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Technical Machine: Evolution
text: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.

name: Rocky Helmet
text: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if it is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Artazon
text: Once during each player's turn, that player may search their deck for a Basic Pokémon that doesn't have a Rule Box and put it onto their Bench. Then, that player shuffles their deck. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

name: Artazon

name: Jamming Tower
text: Pokémon Tools attached to each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) have no effect.
